title: Strengthening Business Competencies: Science Inquiry Projects Utilizing Location-Based Situated Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary science concepts and basic mobile device proficiency
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can systematically collect field survey data using location-based data-gathering tools.
Learners can complete projects that solve scientific problems by analyzing collected data.
Learners can monitor and improve individual learning outcomes using analytical features of location-based learning tools.
